content: i love it so much when mrs weasley sends her handknits to ron and harry don t you i named these mitts for mrs w because like her they are cozy and generous and a little bit magic the slipped-stitch cable on the top looks fancy but is super simple to execute the gusseted thumb and extra-long ribbing under the wrist feel like a warm hug on your hand and they re weirdly form-fitting and stretchy these mitts land nicely in that sweet spot of interesting enough to be fun but easy enough to be tv knitting two sizes xs/s is for petite paws m is regular size
